Job Description:
Embedded Software Development 

Experience in design,  development,  coding/ porting,  testing and debugging of embedded software components:  

  -  BSPs 

  -  Boot loaders (uBoot,  etc) 

  -  Drivers 

  -  Diagnostics 

  -  Kernel mode components 

  -  Network protocols 

  -  Middleware 

  -  Embedded applications 

Coding in C/ C++,  Shell Scripting,  knowledge of HTML/ GUI for embedded applications. 

Familiarity with high performance RTOS:  Embedded Linux /  VxWorks /  QNX /  Nucleus WinCE Other. 

Familiarity with high performance processors:  PowerPC /  Intel Core,  x86 /  ARM /  MIPS,  Network Processors. 

Familiarity with network protocols:  TCP/ IP,  SNMP v2- v3,  L2/ L3 switching/ routing,  VLAN,  VPN,  RSTP,  IGMP,  802.1x,  GPON,  etc. 

Familiarity with performance testing and improvement to meet embedded system requirements.
Functional Area: IT Software - Embedded, EDA, VLSI, ASIC, Chip Design,
